original_text: and commanded the people, “As soon as you see the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God being carried by the Levitical priests, then you shall set out from your place and follow it.
korean_text: 백성에게 명령하여 이르되 너희는 레위 사람 제사장들이 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약궤 메는 것을 보거든 너희가 있는 곳을 떠나 그 뒤를 따르라

sentences.original_text: “As soon as you see the ark of the covenant of the Lord your God,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 너희 하나님 여호와의 언약궤를 보는 즉시,

sentences.original_text: then you shall set out from your place
